metadata.title: CVE-2024-21506 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package pymongo before 4.6.3 are vulnerable toOut-of-bounds Read in the bson module. Using the crafted payload theattacker could force the parser to deserialize unmanaged memory. The parsertries to interpret bytes next to buffer and throws an exception withstring. If the following bytes are not printable UTF-8 the parser throws anexception with a single byte.

criterions.comment: pymongo package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
